Normal Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player moves. Vanilla: 6

Strafe Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player moves when walking backwards or to the side. Vanilla: 4

Walk Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player moves when holding the walk (roll mode) button. Vanilla: 3

Focused Lantern Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player moves while focusing a lantern. Vanilla: 2

Ground Acceleration.tooltip: How quickly the player reaches their maximum speed. Vanilla: 0.5

Jump Power.tooltip: How high the player jumps. Vanilla: 7

Air Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player can move in midair. Vanilla: 3

Air Acceleration.tooltip: How quickly the player reaches their maximum speed while in midair. Vanilla: 0.09

Jetpack Acceleration.tooltip: How powerful the player's jetpack is. Vanilla: 6

Jetpack Boost Acceleration.tooltip: How powerful the player's jetpack is while boosting. Vanilla: 23

Max Jetpack Boost Time.tooltip: How long the player can use their jetpack boost, in seconds. Vanilla: 1

Jump Style.tooltip: Charge: you have to hold space to charge a jump and release space to perform the jump. Instant: the player will jump immediately upon pressing space. Vanilla: Charge

Enable Enhanced Air Control.tooltip: Makes the character more maneuverable in midair; allows changing direction during a jump. Vanilla: Disabled

Enable Sprinting.tooltip: Allows the player to sprint. Vanilla: No

Sprint Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player moves while sprinting. Default Mod Setting: 12

Sprint Strafe Speed.tooltip: How quickly the player moves when sprinting backwards or to the side. Default Mod Setting: 8

Sprint Button.tooltip: Whether sprinting uses the Up Thrust button (usually shift or right trigger) or the Down Thrust button (usually control or left trigger). Default Mod Setting: Up Thrust.

Allow Thrusting on Ground with Sprinting.tooltip: With this enabled, the player can start thrusting on the ground as long as they aren't actively moving. Default Mod Setting: Enabled

Enable Emergency Boost.tooltip: Allows the player to shoot up into the air by pressing space twice. Default Mod Setting: Enabled

Emergency Boost Power.tooltip: How powerful an emergency boost is. Default Mod Setting: 20

Emergency Boost Cost.tooltip: The amount of fuel an emergency boost uses. Default Mod Setting: 20

Floaty Physics in Low-Gravity.tooltip: Lowers the player's acceleration in low gravity, making movement floatier. Default Mod Setting: Disabled

Floaty Physics Power.tooltip: How strongly floaty physics takes affect in any given gravity. Default Mod Setting: 1

Enable Wall Jumping.tooltip: Allows the player to climb up walls by jumping off of them. Default Mod Setting: Disabled

Wall Jumps per Jump.tooltip: How many times the player can Wall Jump without touching the ground. Default Mod Setting: 5

Enable Debug Log.tooltip: Prints certain events to the Outer Wilds Mod Manager console.
